name: Toyota Land Cruiser Prado TX 2018

name: BMW X2

description: 4 cylinder engine, 6-speed gear box, power steering, power windows, power door lock, child safety lock, adjustable seat, 4-wheel disc brakes, strut front suspension, double wishbone back suspension, 4 number of cylinders , Fuel_system with direct injection of gasoline, 35.4 feet minimum turning radius, tubeless type tyre, 60.2 liters Fuel_tank capacity, the car has 4 doors, anti lock braking system, USB & auxiliary input, rear reading lamp, parking sensor, bottle holder, 1 liter of Fuel_will go up to 26Km on the long highway, electronic stability control, dual zone A/C, made in Japan.

name: Audi A5
